entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Successful?  120,000 dead countrymen and climbing because you and Donald wouldn’t take COVID-19 serious.  Europe has done a much better job than America.  Care about the people, not politics and getting re-elected.  Shameful.
